unexpected way!

Thanks to Stu and Cindy ( Angelica’s Mom )
The family was invited to a lab of sorts for a
tour and business related reasons.

Why they brought the kids who knows
but Angelica got bored and separated.
Then Angelica overheard some careless
scientists.


They had made a growth serum.
Sure it was stored in baby bottles
which Angelica found a bit embarrassing but
this was too good for her to pass up.


Angelica’s mind went wild at the possibilities!
She could become big, not just big
she could be big enough to disobey her
parents, big enough to be president,
Big enough to do whatever she wanted
no matter what!

She could be the biggest thing in
the world or even a queen!

Angelica wasted no time and emptied her
backpack.
Then she found her doll Cynthia.


“I’m sorry Cynthia but I need all the room
in the backpack I can get for operation
Queen Angelica”


She tossed the doll aside and made her move.
She snuck into a room with several
baby bottles full of a green formula.

Angelica knew time was short so
she filled her bag with bottles and snuck out.


Time skip to a park a short time after the
tour and her theft.
Angelica hid from the others ready to
enact her plans.

Angelica knew her moment had come.
She wastes little time and making sure
no one could see her begins sucking on
bottles of growth serum.

"Good girl, Fifi." Chas said to Fifi. Kira, however, was less than pleased. She had spent a long time making the sweater, and Fifi didn't even want to wear it.

"Oh, fine, Fifi! If you want to run around naked all day, then go ahead!" Kira told Fifi angrily.

"Well, it all started after mommy saw Lil and me nakie." Phil began.

"After she took us home, she took our Reptar doll away and wouldn't let us play outside until we agreed to stay in our clothes." added Lil.

"And then she made us take a bath afterwards. Man, I hate baths!" complained Phil.

"And then after that, Mommy dressed us in our pajamas, which we couldn't get off, and made us go to bed early!" concluded Lil.

"So, is Tommy still nakie?" Phil asked Chuckie.

"No. After he went nakie at his Grandpa's dinner last night, he decided it was much better to wear clothes than be nakie, so he decided never to take his clothes off again." Chuckie told the twins.

"That doesn't sound so bad." said Phil.

15121121.content:
One night, Tommy was tired of being a baby. He wanted to be able to do the things that older children do, like go to school, cross the street by himself, and play big kid games. As he went to bed that night, he saw a shooting star in the night sky.

"I wish I was older. I want to do the things that big kids do." said Tommy, then he fell asleep in his big boy bed. Early the next morning, when he woke up, he was older and taller. He was now eleven years old, and as a result, just barely fit in his big boy bed and his shirt and diaper got tighter. He also had a full head of purple hair.

"My wish came true, I'm a big boy now!" said Tommy in a deeper voice. He covered his mouth upon hearing his voice.

"Is that my voice? I didn't expect it to be so deep." said Tommy.

What happens next?

151211211.content:
Tommy's amazement was cut short by his urge to pee. Now that he was eleven years old, Tommy knew that he could no longer use his diapers whenever he needed to pee like he did when he was one. Fortunately, now that he was older, he had the knowledge he needed to use the toilet whenever he had to pee, so he decided to do just that. He ran into the bathroom and closed the door. Then, he walked up to the toilet and untaped his diaper, letting it fall to the floor. Once his diaper was off, Tommy started peeing in the toilet. As he peed, he was amazed at how much liquid his new eleven-year-old bladder could hold. He continued to pee until at last, his bladder was empty. When he was all done, he flushed the toilet. Then he picked up his untaped diaper and taped it back onto his bottom. Since he had gotten older, his diaper had gotten a little tighter, so he taped it so it was just loose enough to fit him. After that, he went to the sink to wash his hands.

15512311.content: How do they get there?
15512311.title: The Three Travel to a Dimension Where Dogs Act ...

155123111.content:
One day, Stu had built a new doghouse for Spike, and put it in Tommy's backyard. Unfortunately, this new doghouse didn't look very much like a doghouse at all. It looked more like a magic booth. Stu didn't question the design, he just thought this new doghouse looked like a high-tech model. Tommy and Chuckie were confused when they saw the new doghouse.

"Tommy, this is the strangest-looking doghouse I ever sawed. Are you sure your daddy built it right?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"Of course, Chuckie. He's my daddy. He knows what he's doing." Tommy assured Chuckie.

"Well, Spike, what do you think of your new doghouse?" Tommy asked Spike. Spike wimpered unhappily.

"Maybe he just needs to look inside, Tommy." suggested Chuckie.

"Good idea, Chuckie." said Tommy. The two toddlers pushed Spike into the new doghouse, and when they went inside, they fell through a dimensional tunnel. When they reached the other end of the tunnel, they were in a strange city where dogs acted like humans; they stood upright, wore clothes, and spoke English.

In this dimension, did Spike stand upright and speak English?
155123111.title: One of Stu's Inventions

choices: A Police Dog Comes Across Tommy, Chuckie, and Spike
1551231111.content:
"Tommy, I don't think we're in your house no mores." Chuckie told Tommy.

"You're right, Chuckie. This place looks really strange." added Tommy as he and Chuckie walked around the strange new city.

"This is my kind of place. I could really dig being here." Spike said as he walked upright behind Tommy and Chuckie. The two toddlers stopped and turned around when they heard Spike talk.

"Spike, you can talk!" exclaimed Tommy.

"Of course I can, I always could. You just never understood what I was saying." Spike told Tommy and Chuckie.

"That's because it always came out like 'Woof! Woof! Ruff! Arf!'." Tommy told Spike.

"Hey, you speak dog pretty good!" Spike told Tommy.

"This is getting too weird for me." said Chuckie. Tommy, Chuckie, and Spike looked around. Everywhere in this dimension, all the dogs were standing upright and wearing clothes.

"Wow, Chuckie, all the peoples here are dogs!" Tommy told Chuckie.

"Only they're all wearing clothes like peoples!" added Chuckie.

"Except for me, I feel so naked!" Spike said as he blushed and covered his naked body with his front paws.

What happens next?
1551231111.title: Yes

15512311111.content:
Just then, a Police Dog passed by Tommy, Chuckie, and Spike.

"Afternoon, gentlemen." said the Police Dog.

"Hi!" Tommy, Chuckie, and Spike said simultaneously.

How did the Police Dog react to seeing humans in his dimension?
15512311111.title: A Police Dog Comes Across Tommy, Chuckie, and S...

choices: Spike Runs into a Kindly Sheriff Dog
155123111111.content:
When the Police Dog saw Tommy and Chuckie, he was shocked. He blew his whistle.

"What's wrong, Officer?" Spike asked the Police Dog.

"Your human friends there don't have a collar or license, and they're not on leashes. Unlicensed humans are illegal in this city, so I'm afraid I'm going to have to take your friends to the Human Pound!" the Police Dog told Spike.

"Run, Tommy, run!" Chuckie told Tommy. Tommy, Chuckie, and Spike all ran away.

"Come back here!" said the Police Dog, and he chased after them.

What happens next?
155123111111.title: Shocked

1551231111111.content:
As Tommy and Chuckie continued to run from the Police Dog, Spike came across a Sheriff Dog.

"Hold on there, son." said the Sheriff Dog, and Spike stopped to talk to him.

"You'll be in a heap of trouble if that Police Dog catches you with those humans." the Sheriff Dog told Spike.

"I know, but they're my best friends! I can't let anything bad happen to them!" Spike told the Sheriff Dog.

"I appreciate your enthusiasm, but in this city, it's every dog for himself." the Sheriff Dog told Spike. Meanwhile, Tommy and Chuckie continued to run away from the Police Dog. Chuckie was beginning to get tired from running.

"Tommy, we can't just keep running. I'm getting tired! We gotta find someplace to hide!" Chuckie told Tommy.

"You might be right, Chuckie. I'm beginning to feel a little tired myself." Tommy said in agreement.

Where did Tommy and Chuckie hide?
1551231111111.title: Spike Runs into a Kindly Sheriff Dog

15512311111111.content:
Tommy and Chuckie came across a Dog Groomer's shop. They decided to hide there. Inside the Dog Groomer's Shop, a Poodle was giving another dog a fur cut.

"Darling, I simply can't do a thing with your dull and lifeless fur." the Poodle said to her customer. Suddenly, Tommy and Chuckie ran past her.

"Gracious! Humans!" the Poodle said, and the Dog Customer stared in shock, causing her fur to frizz up.

"Ah, that's more like it!" said the Poodle as she began cutting the Dog Customer's fur. Just then, the Police Dog came in.

"Excuse me, ladies. Have you seen two humans?" the Police Dog asked the Poodle and the Dog Customer.

"Yes, they just ran right past us." the Poodle told the Police Dog.

"Thank you. I hope you don't mind the routine search." said the Police Dog.

"Not at all. The sooner we are rid of those humans, the better." said the Poodle.

Where did Tommy and Chuckie hide?

155123111111111.content:
Tommy and Chuckie came across a barrel of dog fur.

"Quick, Tommy! Let's hide in here!" said Chuckie.

"Good idea, Chuckie." said Tommy, and the two toddlers climbed into the barrel. Just then, the Police Dog came to the barrel. Fortunately, he didn't know Tommy and Chuckie were in it.

"Where are you? Come out, come out, wherever you are!" said the Police Dog.

Did the Police Dog find Tommy and Chuckie in the barrel?

15512311111111111.content:
All of a sudden, Chuckie sneezed. The Police Dog heard his sneeze.

"Aha!" exclaimed the Police Dog. He ran over to the barrel and pulled Tommy and Chuckie out by their shirts.

"Now I've got you! You two are going to the Human Pound now!" said the Police Dog.

"Sorry, Tommy. I couldn't help it. The fur was tickling my nose." Chuckie told Tommy.

"I know, Chuckie." said Tommy sadly. The Police Dog took Tommy and Chuckie to the Human Pound, and locked them up in a cell. Chuckie was feeling particularly miserable.

"I'm scared, Tommy." Chuckie told Tommy.

"Don't worry, Chuckie. Our mommies and daddies will find us." Tommy assured Chuckie, trying to cheer him up.

"How, Tommy? They don't know where we are!" Chuckie reminded Tommy.

"You're right, Chuckie. We don't even know where we are!" said Tommy.

"We're doomed! Doomed! Doomed, I tell you!" moaned Chuckie. Suddenly, Tommy got an idea on how he and Chuckie were going to break out.

"Wait a minute, Chuckie! Why didn't I think of it before? I'll just use my studriver to break us out!" Tommy exclaimed, and he checked his diaper.

Did Tommy find his screwdriver in his diaper?
15512311111111111.title: Chuckie's Sneeze

155123111111111112.content:
To Tommy's horror, his diaper was empty and his screwdriver wasn't in it.

"Oh no! Chuckie! My studriver must have fallen out of my diapie when we were running from that Police Dog!" exclaimed Tommy.

"See, Tommy, I told you! We're doomed!" Chuckie told Tommy.

"Not yet, we're not. The Police Dog didn't catch Spike. Once Spike finds out we're in trouble, he'll come to save us!" Tommy told Chuckie. Meanwhile, Spike was still talking to the Sheriff Dog.

"My friends and I will be safe in our own dimension. If we can just find that magic doghouse, we can get back there." Spike told the Sheriff Dog.

"Why would you want to risk your life for a couple of humans, anyway?" the Sheriff Dog asked Spike.

"Haven't you ever heard the saying, 'A dog's best friend is his human'?" Spike asked the Sheriff Dog.

"Nope, can't say that I have." said the Sheriff Dog. Just then, a news report came on television.

"You're watching DNN. Dog News Network." the Announcer said.

"This just in. Two human toddlers have been apprehended at the Dog Groomer's and imprisoned in the Human Pound, where they have been given a life sentence; approximately ten to thirteen years." said the Dog Newscaster as mugshots of Tommy and Chuckie appeared onscreen.

"Oh no! Those are my friends!" exclaimed Spike.

"These two human toddlers were previously seen alongside a rare Siberian Tiger Hound with no clothes on. If you see this dog, please call the number on your screen." the Dog Newscaster said as mugshots of Spike and the number to the News Station appeared onscreen.

"Oh no, now I'm an accomplice to them!" exclaimed Spike.

Does the Dog Sheriff decide to help Spike rescue Tommy and Chuckie?
155123111111111112.title: No

1551231111111111121.content:
The Sheriff Dog decided to help Spike rescue his friends so they could return to their own dimension.

"Don't worry, Spike. I promise not to turn you in. Now, you stay right here, and I'll go to the Tailor Shop to get you some clothes. That way, the other dogs won't recognize you." the Sheriff Dog told Spike.

"Thanks." Spike told the Sheriff Dog.

"While you're there, could you get me a red dress, a pearl necklace, a pair of green glasses, and a red trident wig?" Spike asked the Sheriff Dog.

"Why those clothes?" the Sheriff Dog asked Spike.

"You'll see." Spike told the Sheriff Dog. Soon, the Sheriff Dog came back with the clothes Spike asked for. When Spike put them on, he looked just like Didi.

"Thanks, I owe you one." Spike said, and he left the Sheriff Dog's office.

"Good luck!" the Sheriff Dog said as he waved goodbye to Spike.

Did the other dogs recognize Spike in his disguise?
1551231111111111121.title: Yes

choices: A Disguised Spike Comes to Rescue Tommy and Chuckie
15512311111111111212.content:
Spike came across the Police Dog again. Fortunately for him, the Police Dog didn't recognize him in his disguise.

"Excuse me, Ma'am. I'm looking for this dog. Have you seen him?" the Police Dog asked Spike as he held up a mugshot of Spike.

"Nope, can't say that I have." Spike said in a falsetto voice.

"Thank you, Ma'am. If you do see him, please inform me, okay?" asked the Police Dog.

"Yes, Sir." Spike said in a falsetto voice.

"Have a nice day." the Police Dog said, and he walked away. Just then, Spike came across Tommy's screwdriver.

"Tommy's screwdriver! He must have dropped it running from that Police Dog!" Spike exclaimed as he picked it up. Suddenly, he had an idea. Meanwhile, in the Human Pound, the Dog Warden brought Tommy and Chuckie their lunch.

"Okay, prisoners! Lunch time!" said the Dog Warden. Tommy and Chuckie were excited when they heard this, as they hadn't eaten anything since breakfast. To their horror, the Dog Warden served them bowls of dog food. Tommy and Chuckie had eaten dog food once before on Tommy's first birthday, and they found it tasted terrible.

"But this is dog food!" exclaimed Chuckie.

"Of course it is. That's all we serve here." said the Dog Warden.

"But we want real food, like cookies, cake, ice cream, and gummi bears!" Tommy told the Dog Warden.

"Tough. You'll eat your food and like it!" the Dog Warden told Tommy and Chuckie.

What happens next?
15512311111111111212.title: No

155123111111111112121.content:
Suddenly, the disguised Spike came in, carrying a cake.

"Please, Sir, may I speak to the prisoners?" Spike asked the Dog Warden in a falsetto voice.

"Who are you?" asked the Dog Warden.

"I'm just an innocent lady who feels sorry for them." Spike told the Dog Warden in a falsetto voice.

Does the Dog Warden allow Spike to talk to Tommy and Chuckie?
155123111111111112121.title: A Disguised Spike Comes to Rescue Tommy and Chu...

1551231111111111121211.content:
The Dog Warden allowed Spike to talk to Tommy and Chuckie.

"Go ahead, you've got three minutes." the Dog Warden told Spike, and he left.

"Are you who I think you are?" Tommy asked the disguised Spike.

"How do you like my disguise?" Spike asked Tommy as he removed his glasses.

"Spike! You've come to save..." Chuckie began to exclaim, but Tommy clamped his hand over Chuckie's mouth.

"Shhh! Not so loud, Chuckie! That mean dog might hear us!" Tommy told Chuckie.

"Sorry, Tommy." said Chuckie in a muffled voice.

"I brought you this cake." Spike told Tommy and Chuckie.

"Thanks, Spike." Tommy said, and he and Chuckie began to eat the cake. To their relief, they found Tommy's screwdriver stashed inside it.

"My studriver! You found it! Now we can get out of here!" exclaimed Tommy. Then, Spike noticed the two full bowls of dog food.

"Aren't you boys going to eat your lunch?" Spike asked Tommy and Chuckie.

"No thanks, Spike. You're welcome to have them, though." Chuckie told Spike.

"There's no accounting for taste." Spike said, then he gobbled up Tommy and Chuckie's dog food. Tommy began to pick the lock on his cell with his screwdriver.

Did Tommy succeed in unlocking the door before the Dog Warden returned?
1551231111111111121211.title: Yes

15512311111111111212111.content:
"Almost... got it!" said Tommy as he unlocked the door to his cell. As soon as the door was open, an alarm sounded. The Dog Warden heard the alarm.

"What the... it's a jailbreak! The prisoners are getting away!" the Dog Warden exclaimed.

"Come on, Spike, we gots to get out of here and back home!" Tommy told Spike as he stashed his screwdriver into his diaper, and he and Chuckie ran off.

"Right behind you, Tommy!" said Spike as he followed behind them. Suddenly, he heard a voice.

"Stop! Come back here!" said the Dog Warden as he chased after Tommy, Chuckie, and Spike.

"Uh-oh! That mean dog is after us!" yelled Chuckie.

"Not if I can help it!" said Spike. He removed his disguise and tossed it on the floor behind him. The Dog Warden tripped on the disguise and fell.

"Ouch! Looks like I'm gonna have to call for backup!" said the Dog Warden. He pulled out his radio and spoke into it.

"That strange dog helped the prisoners escape! Send backup!" the Dog Warden said in his radio.

"Did we lose em, Spike?" Tommy asked Spike, who looked behind himself.

"Yep. Shook em' off like a swarm of fleas." Spike told Tommy and Chuckie. Suddenly, Chuckie looked back and screamed in horror.

"What's wrong, Chuckie?" asked Tommy.

"The mean dogs are right behind us!" exclaimed Chuckie. Sure enough, the Police Dog was in a police car with the siren flashing.

"Calling all cars, officer in pursuit of the escaped humans and the fugitive dog! Send backup!" said the Police Dog.

"They're still on our tail! At least mine!" Spike said as he, Tommy, and Chuckie ran for their lives. Soon, a whole trail of police cars were following them.

"We gots to find that magic doghouse and get out of here!" Tommy told Chuckie and Spike.

Did Tommy, Chuckie, and Spike find the magic booth?
15512311111111111212111.title: Yes

155123111111111112121111.content:
Suddenly, Chuckie saw the magic booth.

"Tommy, Spike, look!" Chuckie exclaimed as he pointed at the magic booth.

"Well done, Chuckie! Let's get out of here!" Tommy told Chuckie.

"Home sweet home!" Spike said as he, Tommy, and Chuckie ran into the magic booth. Suddenly, the Police Dog caught up to them.

"I've got you now!" the Police Dog said as he swung a leash in the air like a lasso. The magic booth disappeared just in time.

"Drat! You may have escaped this time, but we'll meet again, and when we do, you'll all be my prisoners!" the Police Dog said as he shook his fist in anger. Inside the magic booth, Tommy, Chuckie, and Spike fell through the dimensional tunnel. They soon ended up back in Tommy's backyard.

"Chuckie, we're back home again!" Tommy told Chuckie.

"Boy, am I glad!" exclaimed Chuckie. Suddenly, Stu went outside, carrying Spike's new doghouse. He saw the booth, unaware of how magical it was.

"Oh, there it is. I must have followed the wrong blueprints. Here's Spike's real doghouse." Stu said as he put the new doghouse down. He then picked up the magic booth and wondered what he was going to do with it.

Were Phil and Lil also in Tommy's backyard?
155123111111111112121111.title: Yes

1551231111111111121211111.content:
"Tommy! Chuckie! There you are!" exclaimed Phil.

"Where have you guys been?" Lil asked Tommy and Chuckie.

"You won't believe where we went! When we went into that magic doghouse, we landed in a city where all the dogs could talk, walk on two feet, and wore clothes!" Tommy told the twins.

"But then it gotted scary! A mean dog caught us and took us to the human pound!" added Chuckie.

"But then Spike saved us and brought us back home!" continued Tommy.

"Yeah, Spike was real cool in that city! He could walk and talk!" Chuckie told the twins.

"Really?" asked Lil.

"Yeah, show em' Spike! Say something!" Tommy told Spike.

Could Spike still talk even though he was back in his own dimension?
1551231111111111121211111.title: Yes

15512311111111111212111112.content:
Spike just barked. Tommy and Chuckie gasped.

"But that's impossible! Spike was talking afore!" Chuckie told Phil and Lil.

"I think you guys have been watching too many cartoons." Lil told Tommy and Chuckie.

"Yeah. Well, me and Lil are gonna go play in the mud now." Phil told Tommy and Chuckie, and he and Lil left.

"I guess Spike can only talk when he's in Dog City." Chuckie told Tommy.

"Yeah. That's too bad, though. I wish he could talk." Tommy said as he gave Spike a hug.

Me, too. So I can tell them how much I missed my old doghouse! thought Spike.
